title: t206 Chase (trophy) and Chance (yellow port.) available...
author: shammus

posts.post_title: t206 Chase (trophy) and Chance (yellow port.) available...
posts.post_content:
Don't have t206s available too often but I have a couple for this weekend.  Both with Sweet Corporal 350 backs.  Chase is a gorgous card - sharp corners, great color and no wrinkling.  Very attractive card in it's SGC 50 holder.  The Chance is rough, but it is a yellow portrait variation and even better - it's cheap!

Asking $40 for the Chance and $145 for the Chase.  Thanks in advance!
Brian
